Trump can't do ANYTHING for his base (permalink) Trump's coalition includes a huge number of people who will suffer terribly from his policies, but who voted for him anyway. Trumpism requires that he find ways to keep those Christmas-voting turkeys happy, or at least distracted. Trump's go-to move for keeping his base happy is inflicting pain on people they hate, like immigrants, racialized people, queers and women.
